title: Coronavirus update: Spain overtakes Italy as country with second most confirmed coronavirus cases
description: Spain is now second only to the United States in terms of confirmed coronavirus cases after overtaking Italy as Europe's most infected nation with more than 117,000 cases.
content:
Updated 
April 04, 2020 01:01:59
Spain has overtaken Italy in its total number of confirmed coronavirus cases, making it the most infected country in Europe and second only to the United States worldwide.
